content: Can you retrieve items that are blue and made of cotton, with a striped design?

function.name: get_color_design_material
function.description: Retrieve details based on specified color, design options, and material type.

color.description: The color to filter the items. This parameter is required.

material.description: The material type to filter the items. This parameter is required.

design.description: A list of design options to consider while retrieving details.
